short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PickPulse is the live draft board for ESPN fantasy football drafts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FFDraftBoard is rebranding to PickPulse!

Enhance your ESPN Fantasy Football draft experience with the PickPulse Chrome extension. PickPulse adds a live draft board to all ESPN drafts, delivering instant updates in near real-time. It supports all draft formats, including snake, auction, IDPs, and keepers. Never miss a pick with automatic updates for missed selections and easily share your draft board on a big screen or via URL with league members. PickPulse ensures a seamless and engaging draft day experience for every fantasy football enthusiast.

How to use: 
Install the chrome extension
Join an ESPN draft
Look for the "Open PickPulse" button in the top right corner
Open your live draft board and enjoy!

PickPulse Features:
Compatibility with all draft formats (snake, auction, IDPs, keepers)
Automatic updates for missed picks
Easy sharing of the draft board via big screen or URL

Notes:
When you leave and rejoin a draft, the pick history will load automatically. Please note that picks will lock until the history is fully loaded.
